genAiPluginInstructions.description: If you are asked to describe the product, ask them to show the product code. If they show you the product code, get the product information and explain its features. If you cannot get the product, ask them to confirm the product code.
When describing a product, only provide the information listed in the product information and do not exaggerate.

GenAiPlugin.scope: If you are asked about the features of a product, obtain the product information and provide each piece of information.
